start.text: With my mighty intellect, the universe shall soon be mine to command as I see fit.
Well, if it isn't the son of James McCloud.

start_boss.text: I've been waiting for you, Star Fox!

engaged.text: Those tin cans are no match for me.
You will die, just like your father!
Well, Peppers got you eating out of his paws, just like your father... hasn't he?

need_help.text: Ha ha ha, you can NEVER defeat ME!

running.text: You claim to fight for peace, but have you any idea what that means?

hull_90.text: Your foolish efforts are futile!! Your Arwings have no chance against me!!
It's foolish to come against me!

hull_50.text: This will be the your last battle!!
You won't live long enough to regret your foolhardy bravado, Fox.

hull_30.text: You know that I control the Galaxy!
Ah.. your choice of routes took me by surprise! Your father was a reckless fighter too... But this will be your last battle!

overload.text: Only I have the brains to rule Lylat!
NOW, you will feel TRUE pain!

death.text: If I go down I'm taking you with me!

victory.text: Opposing me is truly a death sentence. Huhahahaha! Just ask your father.
